article_title: UN aid chief 'appalled' by reported deaths.
sentence: UN  aid  chief  Martin  Griffiths  says  he's  "appalled"  by  reports  that  more  than  100  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  while  waiting  to  collect  life-saving  aid.

article_title: UN aid chief 'appalled' by reported deaths.
sentence: "  On  the  7  October  Hamas  gunmen  killed  about  1,200  people  in  southern  Israel  and  took  253  other  people  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.
